channel.title: CVE Feed for SEIKO EPSON CORPORATION -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SEIKO EPSON CORPORATION -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-38556|2023-08-02T07:19:26.549Z -- seiko%20epson%20corporation -- seiko%20epson%20printer%20web%20config
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in SEIKO EPSON printer Web Config allows a remote attacker to turned off the printer. [Note] Web Config is the software that allows users to check the status and change the settings of SEIKO EPSON printers via a web browser. Web Config is pre-installed in some printers provided by SEIKO EPSON CORPORATION. For the details of the affected product names/model numbers, refer to the information provided by the vendor.

item.title: CVE-2023-27520|2023-04-11T00:00:00 -- seiko%20epson%20corporation -- seiko%20epson%20printers%2Fnetwork%20interface%20web%20config
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in SEIKO EPSON printers/network interface Web Config allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to hijack the authentication and perform unintended operations by having a logged-in user view a malicious page. [Note] Web Config is the software that allows users to check the status and change the settings of SEIKO EPSON printers/network interface via a web browser. According to SEIKO EPSON CORPORATION, it is also called as Remote Manager in some products. Web Config is pre-installed in some printers/network interface provided by SEIKO EPSON CORPORATION. For the details of the affected product names/model numbers, refer to the information provided by the vendor.

item.title: CVE-2023-23572|2023-04-11T00:00:00 -- seiko%20epson%20corporation -- seiko%20epson%20printers%2Fnetwork%20interface%20web%20config
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in SEIKO EPSON printers/network interface Web Config allows a remote authenticated attacker with an administrative privilege to inject an arbitrary script. [Note] Web Config is the software that allows users to check the status and change the settings of SEIKO EPSON printers/network interface via a web browser. According to SEIKO EPSON CORPORATION, it is also called as Remote Manager in some products. Web Config is pre-installed in some printers/network interface provided by SEIKO EPSON CORPORATION. For the details of the affected product names/model numbers, refer to the information provided by the vendor.
